headline: Aon Expands ESG Offering With €260m Emerging Markets Climate Fund
summary: Aon (NYSE:AON) has launched a €260 million Emerging Markets Climate Transition Fund in partnership with Irish Life Investment Managers. The fund targets climate transition opportunities in emerging markets and expands Aon's ESG and climate focused investment offering. This launch adds to Aon's existing climate transition strategies, which already exceed €1b in assets. Aon, trading at $349.64, has seen mixed share performance, with a 1.6% return over the past 30 days and year to date, a 3.2%...
